title: Hotel and Resort News: Two Views of Japan, on the Ice in Las Vegas
text:
TWO TAKES ON JAPAN
The Ritz-Carlton, Kyoto and the Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo have partnered this fall for a One Journey, Two Capitals package. Travelers who book it can explore both the cosmopolitan Tokyo and the zen gardens and ancient temples of Kyoto. The offer includes two nights at each hotel, daily breakfast for two, amenities such as a traditional Japanese fan called an uchiwa and an escorted butler transfer to the train station in either Kyoto or Tokyo. Prices from $2,280. For an additional fee, guests can take in cultural activities offered through each hotel like a Japanese whiskey tasting in Tokyo and a bike tour of temples in Kyoto.
